Title: Good Night
Writer: Alex Gansa (developed for american television by), Howard Gordon (developed for american television by), Gideon Raff (based on the original Israeli series "Prisoners of War" by), Alexander Cary, Charlotte Stoudt
Actors: Claire Danes, Damian Lewis, Rupert Friend, Morena Baccarin
Plot: Brody tries to get in Iran as an informer with the help of CIA.
